model.agent.humanAgent.aatom.tacticalLevel.navigation

Class DiscretizedMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.agent.humanAgent.aatom.tacticalLevel.navigation.DiscretizedMap

  • public final class DiscretizedMap
extends java.lang.Object
    The discretized version of the map used for navigation. It follows the singleton design pattern.
    Author:
    S.A.M. Janssen

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscretizedMap

        public DiscretizedMap(boolean[][] discretizedMap)
        This constructor can be used if you have a boolean representation of the map already. This saves computational time for larger maps. To generate a boolean representation, use the printMap() function after generating the map using the standard getInstance(Map, double) method.
        Parameters:
        discretizedMap - The boolean representation of the map.

      • DiscretizedMap

        private DiscretizedMap(Map map,
                       double precision)
        Private method to prevent object creation.
        Parameters:
        precision - The precision.
        map - The map.
